messages.message: What is the easiest way to interact with iB from a localized perspective where one could use vscode or ipython to attach to a iB environment to run UDF without having to use the UI for dev work. Any docs that show how one would handle this?
I know we have this https://www.instabase.com/docs/guides/advanced/sdlc/, but I don’t think this is exactly what you’re looking for
might be useful to ask in  <#CKBRX13L5|> since they write a lot of UDFs
The SDLC feature is very much in long-term support/we’d like to deprecate it. It’s quite fragile and we’re not looking to make any more improvements to it, except for critical bugs.
